title: My Favorite Wang Fei - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Historical   Romance
tags: Ancient China   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Early Romance   Female to Male   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Knowledge   Transmigration   Tsundere
author: 昔年年
description:
Transmigrating to the ancient times, Luo Chengxuan feels uncomfortable!

Transmigrating into a male, Luo Chengxuan wants to cry!

Right after transmigration they need to marry, Luo Chengxuan only wants to scream out loudly: WTF!

Luo Chengxuan: Lady, you’re really cute

Xiao Xianyue: Are we familiar……

Luo Chengxuan: Sweety, please give me guidance for the rest of my life.

Xiao Xianyue: Ah Xuan, please give me guidance for the rest of my life!>
